Contact

Dear fellow epigraphers!

You can reach all members of the Steering Committee via info@epigraphy.info.

To join us see here.

Social Media

You can follow us at Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube or GitHub.

To see who is behind the Epigraphy.info’s presence on social media, you can read about us at the Social Media section in the Working Groups page.

The technology behind the scene

Webmaster: Petra Heřmánková.

We are using a custom Jekyll theme - Centrarium, made by Ben Centra. Installation and configuration instructions can be found in the GitHub repository. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com. And you can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll.

Subscribe via RSS

Epigraphy.info is an international open community pursuing a collaborative environment for digital epigraphy, which facilitates scholarly communication and interaction.
